Documentation.long_help: Outputs an image with gaussian values.
Documentation.short_help: Outputs an image with gaussian values.

SourceProxy.name: PlatonicSolidSource
SourceProxy.label: Platonic Solid

Documentation.long_help: Create a platonic solid (e.g., cube, icosahedron, etc.)

SourceProxy.Documentation: Generates one of the first fifth platonic solid as a vtkPolyData - Tetrahedron, Cube, Octahedron, Icosahedron and Dodecahedron

IntVectorProperty.name: SolidType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the type of the platonic solid.

Documentation.long_help: Extract a number of components from an ImageData.
Flip an ImageData about its center on a given axis.
Compute the vector field based on Sobel operator.
Resample the PolyData lines in a spline fashion.
Provides some image operations, one or two inputs.

InputProperty.name: Input1
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the Image Mathematics filter.

InputProperty.name: Input2
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the Image Mathematics filter.

Documentation.long_help: Convert input image to another type.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the Image Cast filter.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the Image ShiftScale filter.

Documentation.long_help: Compute the rate of change of a vector field.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input to the Threshold filter.

StringVectorProperty.name: SelectInputScalars
StringVectorProperty.label: Scalars
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property contains the name of the scalar array from which to perform thresholding.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ThresholdBetween
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Threshold Range
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The values of this property specify the upper and lower bounds of the thresholding operation.

Documentation.long_help: Extracts a VOI of an vtkImageData according to the bounds of the source. Choose the image as Input and the 'cut' object as Bounds.
Documentation.short_help: Extracts a VOI defined by the bounding box of a vtkDataSet.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The image you want to probe.

InputProperty.name: Source
InputProperty.Documentation: The DataSet that will define the point locations to probe.
